title: one
desc: Do one thing at a time, and do well.

title: three
desc: Keep on going never give up.

title: four
desc: Whatever is worth doing is worth doing well.

title: six
desc: Never put off what you can do today until tomorrow.

title: seven
desc: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

title: nine
desc: Keep good men company and you shall be of the number.
